title: Homebrew Computer
description: Simple CPU of my own architecture built from discrete logic chips on breadboards (PCBs coming soon?).

title: Physical 3x3x3x3 Hypercube
description: A physical representation of a 3 layered, 4 dimensional analog of a Rubik's Cube based on Melinda Green's 2x2x2x2. Only a prototype but hopefully more to come!

title: Hypercubing Speedsolving
description: Speedsolving higher dimensional and non-euclidean twisty puzzles, many time World Best holder.

title: Speedcubing
description: I've never been super focused on regular speedcubing, but I've been to some competitions.

title: Chimes Website
description: A website for Christmas Chimes videos that my family and family friends use.

title: Karenglish
description: Website and language learning program for the S'gaw Karen Language, still a work in progress, much more content to be added in the future.

title: Any Length Wordle
description: A website to play wordle with any length of words from 1 letter to 52 letters

title: Wordle Analysis and Word Set Finder
description: A program (integrated into a discord bot) that analysis wordle games, word sets, etc. I wrote it in High School when I didn't know good programming practices yet so it is in desparate need of a rewrite, but it works!
